name: Landscapist
description:
Background

I always want to memorize these beautiful curves in the nature, including roads, rivers, mountain s and city skylines. I also enjoy imitating these lines on the picture, so I came up with this game.  Now it's only an early prototype, with 3 levels using the road theme. 

This game will be more suitable for mobile devices. It feels stiff if use direction keys to control.

How to play

Use direction key or AWSD to move the blue circle, cover the road and reach the ring.
